title: Beads Workflow Integration - Pane-Issue Correlation and Audit Trail
description: Add deep workflow integration between fugue panes and beads issues. SCOPE REDUCED: FEAT-050 metadata storage provides foundation for pane-issue correlation (beads.current_issue, beads.assigned_at, beads.issue_history). FEAT-028 tag-based routing enables orchestration notifications. Focus now on convenience wrappers and crash handling rather than new infrastructure.
user_impact: Provides complete audit trail of pane-issue work, easy debugging (what was pane X working on when it crashed), recovery support (restart work on issue Y), and accurate attribution (which pane/session completed each task).
